title: Can we remove Quinn from the game
body: So{{champion:133}}  got 2 kills from me and then went mid and then bot she went from 2 kills at 10 min to 7 at 14 min not to men shin the fact she went from top to bot in less then 30 sec like riot wtf

replies.body: If we listed champions that all summoners wanted removed and Riot removed them League of Legends would only have like 3 champions.
but you have to admit that {{champion:133}} is op
if she gets 2 kills she op
With that logic that makes Gnar extremely op since I got a penta with him yesterday.
No, I don't really have to because she isn't really that OP. Yes, Quinn is strong but she isn't OP.
and while were at it {{champion:104}} jungle kek
